member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.CommandService
member.summary: Encapsulates the command-related routine within a instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.CommandService.ExecuteCommand(Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.CommandId,System.Object)
member.summary: Attempts to find the command, associated with the specified Id and to perform its Execute routine, using the provided parameter.
member.param: The parameter that is passed to the CanExecute and Execute methods of the command.
member.returns: True if the command is successfully executed, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.CommandService.CanExecuteCommand(Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.CommandId,System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the command, associated with the specified Id can be executed given the parameter provided.
member.param: The parameter that is passed to the CanExecute and Execute methods of the command.
member.returns: True if the command can be executed, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.ListViewCommand
member.summary: Represents a command abstraction that is associated with a particular instance.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.ListViewCommand.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the value for this instance. This value is used to associate a command with a known event within a instance.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.ListViewUserCommand
member.summary: Represents a predefined command that aggregates a custom ICommand implementation, which may be used to perform additional action over the default implementation.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.ListViewUserCommand.Command
member.summary: Gets or sets the implementation that is used to perform the custom logic associated with this command.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.ListViewUserCommand.CanExecute(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the command can be executed against the provided parameter.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.ListView.Commands.ListViewUserCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Performs the core action given the provided parameter.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.RadListView.CommandService
member.summary: Gets the instance that manages the commanding behavior of this instance.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.RadListView.Commands
member.summary: Gets the collection with all the custom commands registered with the . Custom commands have higher priority than the built-in (default) ones.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataControls.RadListView.UpdateItemIsSelected(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: A mechanism to change the item selected state that is not triggered by direct changes in the collection. This can be considered as an external update.
